content.title: Games
content.description: Explore and play a variety of fun and challenging games.

items.title: Hangman
items.description: Guess the word before its too late.

items.title: Minesweeper
items.description: Find all the mines without detonating them.

items.title: Snake
items.description: Eat, grow, and avoid hitting the walls!

items.title: Tic Tac Toe
items.description: Outsmart your opponent in this classic game.

items.title: Wordle
items.description: Guess the 5-letter word in six attempts.
